Posted By: syrazemyla (11/20/2012 12:54:15 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
**Not** strictly worse than [Nevermore](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Nevermore). Nevermore does not affect lands, it doesn't stop the card from being cheated onto the battlefield, and its effect ends as soon as it is removed or when the game is over. This effect is more like [Cranial Extraction](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Cranial Extraction) that lasts the entire **match** (and hits all players, which is relevant in multiplayer).  
  
I could easily see a black bordered variant of this, maybe in Orzhov colors or mono-black, at 5 or 6 CMC. Obviously it wouldn't last for the remainder of the match.
posts.html:
Not strictly worse than Nevermore. Nevermore does not affect lands, it doesn't stop the card from being cheated onto the battlefield, and its effect ends as soon as it is removed or when the game is over. This effect is more like Cranial Extraction that lasts the entire match (and hits all players, which is relevant in multiplayer).

I could easily see a black bordered variant of this, maybe in Orzhov colors or mono-black, at 5 or 6 CMC. Obviously it wouldn't last for the remainder of the match.

posts.post_content: This, Portal 2 [Bee Sting](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Bee Sting), [Coils of the Medusa](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Coils of the Medusa), [Dragon Mask](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dragon Mask), [Flailing Ogre](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Flailing Ogre), [Flint Golem](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Flint Golem), [Hickory Woodlot](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Hickory Woodlot), [Meng Huo's Horde](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Meng Huo's Horde), [Nalathni Dragon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Nalathni Dragon), [Ruby Leech](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ruby Leech), [Stasis](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Stasis) and [Verduran Emissary](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Verduran Emissary) are cards that were the only card by its illustrator, that I know. Are there any other?
posts.html:
This, Portal 2 Bee Sting, Coils of the Medusa, Dragon Mask, Flailing Ogre, Flint Golem, Hickory Woodlot, Meng Huo's Horde, Nalathni Dragon, Ruby Leech, Stasis and Verduran Emissary are cards that were the only card by its illustrator, that I know. Are there any other?
